channel.title: IFTTT on ItsNikhil
channel.description: Recent content in IFTTT on ItsNikhil

item.title: Year in Pixel with Journal
item.description: Step-by-step guide to setup Journal with IFTTT Make sure you are on Journal v4.0 or above Background Mail from: Keira Kenealy, Hello so I downloaded your journal app a long time ago I saw the update and updated for about a month it has not been opening I just now saw the warning please please please fix it I love this app but wish I could use it thanks! Is there anyway i can fix it myself?
